pickupsubtitle: We are in Beta! But go ahead and try it!
warning: Popcorn Time streams movies from torrents
warningsubtitle: Downloading copyrighted material through torrents may be illegal in your country. Use at your own risk.
featureonesubtitle: We're constantly searching all over the web for the best torrents from the most important sites.
featuretwosubtitle: Watch any movie as many times as you want. All you need to get started is a proper internet connection.
featurethreesubtitle: If the movie is out there, Popcorn Time will find the best version possible and start streaming it right away.
featurefoursubtitle: No more waiting; watch your movie instantly in HD and with subtitles. And then watch one more.
newway: A whole new way to watch movies
newwaysubtitle: You just take care of the popcorn, leave the rest to us.
browsemovies: These are some of the movies you'd be able to watch
